Name: DashBored
About the game: DashBored is a bizarre RPG taking place in a dark and unique Universe! Nicolas is your average every day shut-in loser. However, one day his world will be turned upside down when he finds himself transported to a pocket dimension for those who have lost their will to live. To make matters worse, this dimension is ruled over by and evil being known as Vurrus, and a weird robot lady seems to have it out for Nic! This day just will not get better! Well hey, no use crying like some sort of baby loser. Pull your pants up, grab a knife, and start fighting! It's the only way to survive here! Help Nic find his way home, meeting a cast of weird friends and enemies, each one more bizarre than the last! Explore a world of varied environments, fight strange monsters, and save the universe! (Accidentally, that is.) Features A classic style turn-based RPG. Seven unique party members to recruit! Strange hamstrung soundtrack. Witty dialogue and funny characters! Multiple Endings! Travel to strange locales and meet their strange locals! Large amount of characters to meet and greet. Rodents that you can flip off! Birds to break your fall! Giant monstrosities to break your bones!
